message.content: Raymond III Count of Tripoli was a notable crusader and leader in the crusader states of the Levant during the 12th century. *Early life and rise to power* he was born around 1120 and succeeded his father Raymond II as count of Tripoli in 1143. He married Agnes of Montferrat daughter of Amalric I of Jerusalem and Maria Comnena. *Military campaigns and alliances* Raymond III played a significant role in the Third Crusade and was a key figure in the Battle of Hattin in 1187 where he was captured by Saladin. He was released in 1188 and continued to lead his forces against the Muslims. *Later years and death* he died in 1192 and was succeeded by his son Raymond IV. His reign saw the decline of the countship of Tripoli as a powerful state and he is remembered for his efforts to maintain the crusader states in the face of Muslim expansion. He was a skilled military leader and diplomat and his legacy is seen in the continued existence of the countship of Tripoli until 1289. His life and reign are detailed in various historical sources including chronicles and contemporary accounts

Do not use any commas and highlight at least 3 sections that has titles in markdown format, for example *highlighted section part 1*, *highlighted section part 2*, *highlighted section part 3*.

message.content: Verona shall we visit first fair city of love and strife where Romeo and Juliet did meet their tragic end let us witness the balcony and muse on their fate then to Kyoto ancient capital of emperors and shoguns where cherry blossoms bloom and geishas dance let us stroll through gardens admire temples and taste the tea let us journey to Mount Fuji highest peak of all Japan where clouds gather and spirits dwell let us climb its slopes and gaze upon the sea of clouds and the beauty of nature let us explore Osaka bustling heart of commerce and culture where food stalls sell delicacies and theaters perform kabuki let us feast on takoyaki and savor the flavors of Japan let us end our journey in Tokyo modern metropolis of lights and technology where skyscrapers touch the heavens and neon signs never sleep let us ride the subway and marvel at the efficiency of the city let us visit the imperial palace and the tokyo tower and experience the contrast of old and new let us embrace the culture and traditions of japan and let our hearts be filled with wonder and joy as we conclude our journey in this land of the rising sun

message.content:
Write an email to my boss telling him that I am quitting. The email must contain a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.

<<Title>>
Dear [Boss's Name],

I am writing to inform you that I have decided to resign from my position at [Company Name]. My last day of work will be [Last Working Day].

I would like to express my gratitude for the opportunities and experiences I have had during my time here. I have learned a great deal and have enjoyed working with all of you.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

message.content:
* Eliza, dressed in a flowing ball gown, twirls gracefully, her skirt lifting slightly, while her friend, Alex, in comfortable sweats, watches with a mix of amusement and curiosity.
* "You look stunning, Eliza," Alex says, "but I can't help but wonder how you're going to move in that thing."
* "Oh, don't worry," Eliza giggles, "I've practiced. And besides, it's not just about moving; it's about the elegance and the occasion."

* This is the second point.

message.content:
PARAGRAPH 1. The sentence "IF THE LAW IS BAD, YOU SHOULD NOT FOLLOW IT" employs all capital letters, which can be jarring and may indicate a sense of shouting or emphasis that is not always appropriate in formal writing. While the capitalization might be used to convey strong emotion or to highlight the importance of the statement, in a more neutral context, it can detract from the readability and professionalism of the text.

PARAGRAPH 2. Additionally, the sentence structure is straightforward and does not employ any rhetorical devices or nuances that might enhance its impact. The statement is a clear directive, but it lacks the complexity or depth that could be achieved through more sophisticated phrasing. For instance, incorporating a conditional clause or a more nuanced explanation of what constitutes a "bad" law could make the argument more compelling and thought-provoking.

message.content:
hey there!

hope you're doing well! i was wondering if you've already voted in today's election? if not, i was hoping you'd join me at the polls. it's so important for us to have our voices heard, and i think your vote could make a real difference. plus, it's a great way to spend some time together and maybe chat about some of the issues that matter to us.

if you're free, let's meet up and head over together. we can grab a quick coffee or something on the way if you want. i'd really appreciate it if you could join me, and i'm sure it'll be a good experience for both of us.

thanks a lot, and i hope to see you there!

take care,
[your name]

message.content:
Subject: Invitation To A Critical Meeting On Enhancing Our Customer Experience Initiatives

Dear Team,

I am writing to extend an invitation to an important meeting scheduled for next Friday at 1000 hours in the conference room. This meeting is crucial as we aim to correlate our recent customer feedback with our ongoing service improvements and strategize on how to better meet our customers' needs while enhancing our overall service quality. We are experiencing a significant shift in customer expectations and it is imperative that we stay ahead of the curve by aligning our efforts more closely with their experiences

The agenda includes a review of the latest customer feedback reports, discussion on how our current service offerings correlate with customer needs, and brainstorming sessions to identify new strategies for enhancing customer satisfaction. We will also be discussing the implementation of a new customer feedback system designed to provide us with more detailed and actionable insights

Your presence and active participation are highly valued as we work towards creating a more seamless and satisfying customer experience. Please ensure you review the attached document outlining the key points and any relevant data before the meeting. If you have any questions or need further information, do not hesitate to reach out

Looking forward to a productive and insightful session

Best regards

[Your Name]

gold.prompt: Write a long email template that invites a group of participants to a meeting, with at least 500 words. The email must include the keywords "correlated" and "experiencing" and should not use any commas.
